Instruction: Make incisions in the chicken meat, nearly reaching the bone. Drizzle 2 tablespoons of lemon juice over the chicken and massage in the salt.

In a large bowl, whisk together the tandoori spice, yogurt, 2 tablespoons of lemon juice, oil, and vinegar. Rub the mixture thoroughly into the cuts of the chicken to coat it well. Place the chicken in a 13x9 inch baking dish, cover it with foil, and refrigerate overnight, turning the chicken occasionally.
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Bake the covered chicken at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 1 hour, removing the foil during the final 15 minutes of baking.
